function evaluateProperty({

}) {

    } else {
        return 'document-template-outline';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-11-24 18:51:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>f75520c6474a161098481845f16d4363</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>icon_item_icon/icon</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Drama" source="x_pamtn_drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f75520c6474a161098481845f16d4363</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-24 18:52:55</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
